welcome_message_body: Welcome to Almada, Portugal! This charming city is known for its stunning beaches, historic sites, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Almada has to offer during your stay.

restaurants.name: Lagoa Azul
restaurants.description: Lagoa Azul is a portuguese restaurant located in Almada.
restaurants.address: Avenida Dom João I, 10 (Rua Cândido Capilé), 2800-111 Almada
